availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Eldred M. Groves (Mason County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Lucinda Groves. Farmer with Lucinda Groves and his brothers in Mason County in 1850. Household owned twenty-two enslaved persons in Mason County in 1850. Farmer with Lucinda Groves and his brothers in Mason County in 1860. Household owned twenty-nine enslaved persons in Mason County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 2, p. 66A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mason County, District 2, p. 727-29, p. 6-7 of 29 of microfilm.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, District 2, p. 161.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Mason, District 2, p. 15B.
